main.Bio: Now #AGE#, #GIVEN# #FAMILY# spends her days managing her seemingly forgotten family inn. Stuck in the past, she has held onto a petty grudge against her high school boyfriend, Yu Narukami, for over a decade. This, however, has come at the cost of #GIVEN#'s relationships with her friends and family.
A teacher at the local middle school, #GIVEN# moved to Inaba alongside her husband, Yu, back in 2015. Originally from Nagano, #GIVEN#
